content: Samantha will go to Tim's room and lay down on his bed in an innocent way. She will get comfortable and tell Tim that she is tired. Tim will get into his bed-time clothes, boxers and a tank top, and lay down next to her. They will continue to talk about her day at school and what she likes to do for fun in an innocent way. Tim will take note of how the light in the room highlights her features and how peaceful she looks as she falls asleep. He will reflect on the day they had together and how much he enjoys spending time with her.
